}}The '''Lord of the Rings Roleplaying Adventure Game''', sometimes called '''The Fellowship of the Ring Adventure Game''', was a simplified roleplaying game released by [[Decipher Inc.]]. It was an introductory version of the ''[[The Lord of the Rings Roleplaying Game]]''.
==Gameplay==
The game is based on the more advanced Roleplaying Game, and features pre-built character sheets describing the fellowship.

Battles are fought on hexagonal tactical maps, using cardboard cut-outs of the characters and monsters.
==Story==
The game begins at the western doors leading into Moria, taking players through several encounters with servants of the Shadow, and culminates with a climactic battle against the dreaded Balrog.
